title: Ragie
description: Ragie is a RAG-as-a-Service platform that helps developers seamlessly integrate RAG into their applications. Ragie Connect takes it a step further by handling user authentication, permissions, and automatic data syncing from sources like Google Drive, Salesforce, and more, enabling effortless user-facing integration of RAG. Our intuitive developer experience with simple APIs & SDKs and built-in advanced features like Hybrid Search helps your application deliver state-of-the-art generative AI.
